title: Parallax
description:
About the game:
================

The interdimensional puzzle platformer, Parallax is a first-person puzzle game with two overlapping worlds. Weave back and forth between black and white as you try to be in the right place, in the right dimension, at the right time. Use switches, boosters and gravity to help you reach the exit. Can you conquer every mind-bending level?

Features:
==========

- The use of portals to toggle action between two different dimensions
- Intelligent design levels and puzzles
- Minimalist aesthetic that works very well with the style of play that raises, with multiple color schemes
- 9 supported languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese-Brazil, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian


Version:
==========

Fifth Patch Round from 19th March 2015


Version changes:
==================

Times in the pause and summary screens now displayed to millisecond precision. >=D


Instructions:
==============

Extract anywhere with compression software (like 7-Zip link below)
Launch Parallax.exe or create shortcut to it
Play - Enjoy - Seed - give me what I need
Speed! Yeah!


System requirements:
=====================

Minimum:
Pentium 4 1.8GHz/Athlon XP 1700+
GeForce 210/Radeon X600 Series
1 GB RAM 
Win Xp 32
DirectX 9
150 MB hard disk space

To properly enjoy the game (based on user input from Game-debate.com):
Pentium 4 3.46GHz/Athlon 64 3800+
GeForce GT 120/Radeon HD 4550
2 GB RAM 
Win Xp 32
DirectX 9

Recommended:
Celeron E1200 Dual-Core 1.6GHz/Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 4000+
GeForce GT 230/Radeon HD 6550D
2 GB RAM 
Win 7 32
DirectX 9
150 MB hard disk space
